cheese.name: Cheese
cheese.description: A slice of orange cheese. It feels eternal.
cheese.onAdd: The cheese settles on you. It is cold, then warm.

reactions.bacon: The cheese thinks of the bacon. They are old friends.
reactions.avocado: The cheese does not like the avocado.
reactions.lettuce: The cheese acknowledges the lettuce without feeling.
reactions.tomato: The tomato and cheese are content.
reactions.questionable_water: The cheese recoils from the water.

bacon.name: Bacon
bacon.onAdd: You take the bacon. It does not bend. It becomes part of you.

reactions.lettuce: The bacon and lettuce say nothing to each other.
reactions.questionable_water: The bacon becomes limp and grey.

lettuce.name: Lettuce
lettuce.onAdd: The lettuce settles lightly. It barely weighs anything.

reactions.tomato: The lettuce and tomato feel natural together.
reactions.avocado: The avocado feels at home with the lettuce.
reactions.bacon: The bacon and lettuce say nothing to each other.
reactions.cheese: The cheese acknowledges the lettuce without feeling.
reactions.questionable_water: The lettuce turns brown and slimy.

tomato.name: Tomato
tomato.description: A slice of red tomato. It is wet and soft.
tomato.onAdd: The tomato sits on you. You feel its moisture.

reactions.lettuce: The lettuce and tomato feel natural together.
reactions.cheese: The tomato and cheese are content.
reactions.avocado: The avocado and tomato recognize each other.
reactions.questionable_water: The tomato becomes mushy and rotten.

avocado.name: Avocado
avocado.description: Green and soft. It seems recent.
avocado.onAdd: The avocado spreads across you gently.

reactions.cheese: The avocado pulls away from the cheese.
reactions.tomato: The avocado and tomato recognize each other.
reactions.lettuce: The avocado feels at home with the lettuce.
reactions.questionable_water: The avocado oxidizes into something black.

pickle.name: Pickle
pickle.description: A pickle slice. It smells sharp.
pickle.onAdd: The pickle settles on you. You taste vinegar in your mind.

reactions.cheese: The pickle and cheese are familiar.
reactions.avocado: The pickle does not belong with the avocado.
reactions.tomato: The pickle feels wrong next to the tomato.
reactions.questionable_water: The pickle becomes bloated and tasteless.

onion.name: Onion
onion.description: Thin rings of white onion. They are sharp.
onion.onAdd: The onion joins you. It is strong and certain.

reactions.tomato: The onion and tomato are old companions.
reactions.lettuce: The onion settles among the lettuce.
reactions.questionable_water: The onion loses its sharpness and becomes sad.

special_sauce.name: Special Sauce
special_sauce.description: A mysterious sauce. You don't know what it is.
special_sauce.onAdd: The sauce spreads across everything. It changes you.

reactions.bacon: The sauce knows the bacon well.
reactions.lettuce: The sauce spreads among the lettuce.
reactions.tomato: The sauce mingles with the tomato.
reactions.avocado: The sauce does not understand the avocado.

meat_patty.name: Meat Patty
meat_patty.description: A meat patty. Without it, you are nothing.
meat_patty.onAdd: The meat patty becomes part of you. You feel whole. You are real.

reactions.questionable_water: The meat patty becomes grey. You feel sick.

questionable_water.name: Questionable Water
questionable_water.description: Water from the bathroom sink. It has been sitting here for some time.
questionable_water.onAdd: The water seeps into you. You feel... uneasy. Something is not right.

reactions.bacon: The water makes the bacon soggy and wrong.
reactions.lettuce: The water wilts the lettuce into something unrecognizable.
reactions.tomato: The water and tomato create something foul.
reactions.avocado: The water turns the avocado brown and bitter.
reactions.pickle: The water dilutes the pickle into nothingness.
reactions.onion: The water makes the onion weep for real.
reactions.special_sauce: The water ruins everything the sauce tried to be.
reactions.meat_patty: The water seeps into the meat. This is not food anymore.
